questions.quote: Hey, kid, quiet. Were did a nice little boy like you learn such a bad word like that? Huh?
You're not crazy. Jerry does wear glasses. He just forgot 'em, that's all.  Not crazy.
Okay, pudgy, lets stop playing games. What happened with margaret?
Can't it? Or is your entire world just crashing down all around you?
Well, my question is, How could Elaine be under the impression that you bought the big salad, when I was the one who handed it to her?
Well, I caved. I mean, I really had to use their bathroom. Frank, no offence, but this holiday is a little  out there.
anyone else, never. But, Leslie - I have a problem saying no to. For some reason, I seem to want her approval.
Blood over there, sausages over here. I'm living in a slaughter house.
Elaine. You shouldn't be reading that. So tell me about this rash of yours.
You know, I don't see how you can sit there eating that and not even offer me any?
